author: avetisya
body: This is the first part of the adaptation for Stage 2. It temporarily removes L1 monitoring until the new database tables are in place and reports the rates of all L1 tech and algo bits to be 0 (as requested by the DAQ group so as not to have to modify their scripts). The L1 physics/calibration/random value is taken from the event just as before. The prescale index and HLT paths and datasets should all be correct.
title: Adapting JSON monitoring to L1 Stage 2
